column1: Little Goat Diner////Highly recommend this place for first timers in Chicago! My cousin took me here and according to her we took dark chocolate chip pancakes
column2: loved them so much the crunch and the perfect softness and lightness of the pancakes. So good Â Other than the pancakes we also tried out the what about kebab
column3: so we had a savoury dish with out pancakes. Also amazing the pita bread so soft
column4: the tahini for dipping the kebabs was a great amount and the quinoa salad with it was so delicious. The dish came together as so lovely
column5: recommend both dishes and for drinks we had hot chocolate and green tea! Love this dinner
column6: will come back in the future !
